name: Cyclomadron Carnage
description:
After Cyclomadron destroyed the evil planet, a big chunk of it fell as a meteor to earth and started infecting that area and every living thing in it, turning them into monsters. After arriving at the area, an underground dungeon was formed from the meteor including all the infected monsters, so it is up to Cyclomadron to destroy every single monster and prevent the spreading of the infection before it infects the whole planet. Will he succeed before it's too late?

___

Cyclomadron Carnage is a difficult 2D retro style puzzle-platformer set in a alternate futuristic universe.

You play as cyborg name Cyclomadron, in a mission to prevent the infection of his planet after killing every infected monster and evading a series of traps. The game contains more than 130 levels, and  there is a different gameplay style, song and theme every few levels. The length of this game is around the same length of the first game, but there is almost double the levels because they are more compact.

The game starts at easy difficulty while teaching the player the mechanics of each theme and it progressively become harder and harder, so this way everyone has a chance to enjoy it.

Some examples of different gameplay are about the player acquiring abilities such as jetpack or laser shooting and many more!

___

Operating Systems:

Windows 32 / 64
Linux 32 / 64
Mac 64

___

Music by Technoaxe

Thank you for visiting, and for those who enjoyed this page enough to buy it, I appreciate the support and I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed creating and testing it!
